mapper.update: update music_sheet set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creator_nick_name = #{creatorNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, collection_number = #{collectionNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_play_count = #{totalPlayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, share_count = #{shareCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, collection_music = #{collectionMusic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, title, description, image, creator_id, creator_nick_name, create_time, collection_number, total_play_count, share_count, collection_music, tag from music_sheet where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
